name: Giant Malice
flavor: At the start of any giant's turn, you can spend Malice to activate one of the following features.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A giant unearths a structure, hazard, or chunk of the encounter map and launches it to fill the area. Each target makes an **Agility test**.
effects.tier1: 18 damage; prone and can't stand (save ends)

effects.effect: Each giant in the encounter takes a deep breath and yells, pushing each creature within 3 squares of them up to 10 squares. A creature who can be pushed by more than one giant is pushed by one giant of your choice.

A giant creates a fissure along the ground, either in a 15 x 2 line within 1 or a 10 x 3 line within 2, and that opens up to a depth of 6 squares. Each giant in the area can shift into the nearest unoccupied space outside the fissure. Each non-giant in the area makes an **Agility test**.
effects.tier1: 10 damage; the target falls into the fissure, and is prone and can't stand (EoT)
effects.tier2: 10 damage; the target is prone and hanging onto the edge of the fissure
effects.tier3: The target can shift into the nearest unoccupied space outside the fissure.
